mapper.sql: id, exc_requ_param, exc_name, oper_method, oper_uri, oper_ip, oper_create_time
mapper.insert: insert into exception_info (id, exc_requ_param, exc_name, oper_method, oper_uri, oper_ip, oper_create_time, exc_message) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{excRequParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{excName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{excMessage,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update exception_info
exc_requ_param = #{excRequParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exc_name = #{excName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
oper_method = #{operMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
oper_uri = #{operUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
oper_ip = #{operIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
oper_create_time = #{operCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
exc_message = #{excMessage,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
